about_the_game:
In Sexy Apocalypse Girls you will play as Liam, who is desperately trying to survive and find his place in this dangerous and crazy new reality. He will meet different characters from hot beautiful girls to suspicious murky guys along the way. Who can you truly trust? Only you and your decisions will affect the fate of the main character.

The plot of the game takes place after a year of a devastating pandemic. Only a small fraction of the world's population survived. Many people have turned into wild animals for getting food and basic resources, while others have tried to retain their humanity in hopes of finding shelter and a better life. Does a peaceful life exist in a post-apocalypse world or is it just a way to believe in something?

In the game you will find:

⁃ Diverse Locations;
⁃ Juicy and colourful pictures that will immerse you in a world of zombies and post-apocalypse;
⁃ Exciting plot with many unexpected twists and turns;
⁃ And, of course, spicy romantic scenes that will provide real pleasure.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains images of sex, scenes of violence and strong language.
